hours_text:
# 7 South Street, Litchfield, CT 06759

**_[Staff Offices](https://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/about-us/our-people/)_**  
Monday through Friday: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.  
(except when noted on the [Calendar of Events](http://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/calendar-list/))

**_[Helga J. Ingraham Memorial Library](http://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/collections/library)_**  
Tuesday through Friday – By Appointment  
(except when noted on the [Calendar of Events](http://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/calendar-list/))  
Call 860 567 4501 or email [archivist@litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org](mailto:archivist@litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org) to schedule an appointment.

[**_Litchfield History Museum  
_**](http://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/museums/litchfield-history-museum/)**Closed for the Season**  
Reopening April 18, 2026

# 82 South Street, Litchfield, CT 06759

[**_Tapping Reeve House & Law School_**](http://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/museums/tapping-reeve-house-and-law-school/)************  
**Closed for the Season**  
************ Reopening April 18, 2026

[_**Tapping Reeve Meadow**_](http://www.litchfieldhistoricalsociety.org/museums/tapping-reeve-meadow/)  
**Open everyday, dawn to dusk**

[Google Maps to Litchfield Historical Society](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Litchfield+Historical+Society/@41.746862,-73.191462,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e790ce61be527b:0x5a5544b092f35b3f!8m2!3d41.746858!4d-73.189268?hl=en)

* * *
